name: part_010
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア生誕祭LIVE】遅れてやってきた私の誕生日LIVE！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [H1vf2vF1LmE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare and Yukihana Lamy finish their performance of 'Mister Gazer' by Shito.
MC section where Flare and Lamy talk about their previous collaborations and Flare's birthday.
Performance of 'How-to World Domination' by Shiranui Flare and Hoshimachi Suisei.

subtitles.original: 世界征服 どんな雨にも負けぬ信じ合える気持ち
subtitles.english: World domination. A feeling of mutual trust that won't give in to any rain.

subtitles.original: この空の観測者
subtitles.english: This sky's observer.

subtitles.original: この空は明日の証明
subtitles.english: This sky is the proof of tomorrow.

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ラミィ！
subtitles.english: Lamy!

subtitles.original: いいのかなこれで。
subtitles.english: Is this okay?

subtitles.original: 今のすごいいつMC入る？みたいな顔してたよ。
subtitles.english: You had this "When do we start the MC?" look just now.

subtitles.original: ちょっと伺っちゃった。
subtitles.english: I was a bit hesitant.

subtitles.original: いや、まず、お誕生日！
subtitles.english: Well, first of all, your birthday!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！おめでとうって言われる前に、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Before you even said it, thank you!

subtitles.original: 気が早い、気が早い。
subtitles.english: You're too quick, too quick.

subtitles.original: いやなんか、ラミィとはさ、一緒にARKもしてたじゃん。
subtitles.english: Well, you know, I played ARK with you, Lamy.

subtitles.original: なんかちょっとダサい名前つけてたよね。
subtitles.english: You gave it a bit of a tacky name, didn't you?

subtitles.original: 忘れちゃった、なんだっけ。次のライブまでに思い出しておこうか。
subtitles.english: I forgot, what was it? Let's try to remember by the next live.

subtitles.original: あの、ARKの時のやつの。
subtitles.english: That thing from the ARK days.

subtitles.original: なんかダサすぎて忘れちゃった。
subtitles.english: It was so tacky I forgot.

subtitles.original: でも、今後それでやるんでしょ。
subtitles.english: But you're going with that from now on, right?

subtitles.original: 雪透をやめたんだっけ？
subtitles.english: Did we stop being "Yukitoru"?

subtitles.original: やめたんだよ。
subtitles.english: We did.

subtitles.original: ま、今日は、そんな二人で、
subtitles.english: Well today, the two of us...

subtitles.original: シトさんの曲をね。
subtitles.english: will sing a song by Shito.

subtitles.original: ラミィにめっちゃ合いそうって思ったから。
subtitles.english: I thought it would suit Lamy perfectly.

subtitles.original: ミスター・ゲイザー選んできたんだよ。
subtitles.english: So I chose "Mister Gazer".

subtitles.original: Wikipediaで見た。
subtitles.english: I saw it on Wikipedia.

subtitles.original: 本人に聞きなよ！
subtitles.english: Ask me directly!

subtitles.original: なんでWikiなんだよ！
subtitles.english: Why Wikipedia?!

subtitles.original: なんか、調べて、これお前のこと知ってるんやでってアピールしたかった。
subtitles.english: I researched it, and I wanted to show that I know about you.

subtitles.original: ありがとう、嬉しいよ。
subtitles.english: Thank you, I'm happy.

subtitles.original: ほら、でも、着替えさせてもらって。
subtitles.english: But look, I have to go change now.

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: そんなテンションなのこれ？
subtitles.english: Is that the energy level for this?

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: なんでだよ、気が合わなすぎるんだけど。
subtitles.english: Why?! We're so out of sync.

subtitles.original: いや、ありがとう、じゃあまた一緒に。また、また一緒に。
subtitles.english: Well, thank you. Let's do this again. See you soon.

subtitles.original: ありがとうね！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: んーまっ！
subtitles.english: *Blows kiss*

subtitles.original: ハウトゥー世界征服 作詞・作曲：Neru
subtitles.english: How-to World Domination / Lyrics & Composition: Neru

subtitles.original: 泣きべそ隠してんのは どちら様
subtitles.english: Who's the one hiding their tears?

subtitles.original: 笑われた分だけやり返せ
subtitles.english: Pay them back for every time they laughed at you.

subtitles.original: 今に見てろと 手に取ったものは
subtitles.english: "Just you wait," I said as I picked up...

subtitles.original: 爆弾やナイフなんてもんじゃないけど
subtitles.english: though it wasn't something like a bomb or a knife.

subtitles.original: 一切合切今後どうなったって約束しよう
subtitles.english: No matter what happens from here on out, let's promise

subtitles.original: 背中の値札を引き剥がせ
subtitles.english: to rip off the price tag on our backs.

subtitles.original: 廃材みたいな毎日だけど
subtitles.english: Our days might feel like scrap material, but

subtitles.original: 捨てるのはまだ早いだろ
subtitles.english: it's too early to throw them away.

subtitles.original: 今日も ぼっち丸めながら
subtitles.english: Today again, curling up alone

subtitles.original: 終点駅のホームで
subtitles.english: on the platform of the terminal station.

subtitles.original: 明日の僕をまだ待っている
subtitles.english: Still waiting for tomorrow's me.

subtitles.original: わがままで のろまな 主の帰還を
subtitles.english: For the return of the selfish, slow master.

subtitles.original: どうせ幾年経って 車が空飛べど
subtitles.english: Even if years pass and cars fly in the sky,

subtitles.original: きっと幾年経って 機械が喋れども
subtitles.english: even if years pass and machines can speak,

subtitles.original: 何だって言いたいんだ 便利という前に
subtitles.english: I've got something to say: before calling it "convenience,"

subtitles.original: 心の傷口を 治してくれ
subtitles.english: please heal the wounds in my heart.

subtitles.original: あんな空でミサイルが飛ぶのなら
subtitles.english: If missiles are to fly in a sky like that,

subtitles.original: そんなもので幸せを呼ぶのなら
subtitles.english: if happiness is to be called by such things,

subtitles.original: 優しい人になれなくちゃ 僕は僕を
subtitles.english: then unless I can become a kind person,

subtitles.original: 肯定してゆけるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I'll ever be able to affirm myself.

subtitles.original: 頭を上げて前向けと言われても
subtitles.english: Even if told to lift my head and look forward,

subtitles.original: 暗闇じゃ前もクソもないな
subtitles.english: in the darkness there's no "forward" or anything.

subtitles.original: 一人でいれど 二人でいれど
subtitles.english: Whether I'm alone or with someone else,

subtitles.original: この苦は孤独に変わりゃしねえ
subtitles.english: this loneliness won't change into anything else.

subtitles.original: 死にたいなんて歌歌って
subtitles.english: Singing songs about wanting to die,

subtitles.original: またそれかと釘を打たれた
subtitles.english: I was driven in like a nail with "That again?"

subtitles.original: だけどそれほどのことしか
subtitles.english: But there's only so much that

subtitles.original: 口からこぼれる言葉が どうしても
subtitles.english: words spilling from my mouth can do, no matter what.

subtitles.original: 見つからないんだ
subtitles.english: I just can't find them.

subtitles.original: 今日の僕もまたこうして
subtitles.english: Today's me is again being

subtitles.original: 下賤に吸い込まれる 明日が...
subtitles.english: sucked into the vulgarity like this. Tomorrow...
